title: Crunchy cheesey pepper chicken
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets', '1 large slice roasted red pepper, halved (from jar is fine)', '1/2 soft mozarella ball, sliced', 'golden breadcrumbs', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1 egg, beaten', 'a little butter and oil for frying']
